They hold hands as their last act and Akai thinks about the last thing in the doujin, a continuation from what he said before. He said that he wanted them to die happy and now says. ''ONLY WE CAN UNDERSTAND...''  ''THAT FEELING'', then the panel goes away from the inside of the van, up to the sky against the van, only the van can be seen and it ends with the words.                                                                                                                                               ''YEAH...'' ''WE ALONE..'' and so it ends. I'm sorry for my english i'm not an native speaker and I hope you liked the small talk about the doujin. And its really weird that it took me basically 2 hours to write this. Well the rat goes out, bye and have a good day.

''IT'S BECAUSE WE WERE TOGETHER ... THAT WE WERE ABLE TO DO THAT RIGHT?'' while asking. Akai just answers with ''YEAH'' while smiling. After that smile Akai begins to notice that the effects are kicking in and he is beginning to sweat. Then Yamazaki feels that his head begins to hurt, and Akai asks if he wants to end it with sleeping because being awake would be hell, but Yamazaki denies and says ''LET'S KEEP TALKING UNTIL WE AREN'T ABLE TO ANYMORE''. Then he comes up with an idea and says it out loud loudly ''RANKING OF THE GIRLS WE LIKED...'', but Akai tells him that it would be impossible because of the time constraint while laughing. The camera goes away from the ceiling of the car to their hands.

instead of laughing, the mc cries over the joke, coming with the excuse that his nerves are going crazy. Then Yamazaki tells the mc that i found out right now is named Akai that he is happy they met eachother and he would most probably already be dead, and Akai responds by saying that he would most probably be arrested over something stupid. After that Akai asks Yamazaki if he would be able to rape the girls by himself, but Yamazaki justs answers that he wonders about that too. After a little pause Yamazaki comes to the conclusion and tells Akai.

full effect. They talk about how their life would be without eachother and how it would most probably not be better than their current one. The MC keeps away a secret of a dream from Yamazaki. In the dream the MC imagines how Yamazaki was in his fifth year in university and making a book that he wanted to sell the next day at komiket, the MC helped him with the book and hoped it would sell. He kept away the dream from Yamazaki because he knew that this would be their last day on earth. He didn't want any sadness at their end. He just wanted happiness and laughter at the end of the road. Their last conversation is about how many girls they raped, they get to the conclusion that they got to 11 middle schoolers. Even at the end they are goofing over what they still want to do, like double penetration or fucking sisters, but the car is too small for that. After the double penetration talk Yamazaki tells a joke to the mc where he says that he is happy thtat both have the same dicksize, but

This may be the best (unironically) hentai/doujin i have read. The art is a 6 or 7 out of 10, but the plot tho. THE PLOT. The plot is 10/10. It may be weird that this is the best one i have read, because it's just 2 guys hanging out and raping small girls. It should be disgusting, but yet it is not and I think it's because of the friendship they made over, pedophillia. It's disgusting, but at the same time sad that the last thing they talk about is what they have been doing for the last time, and how they are suprised by how long they have been able to do this, without being caught. I actually cried at the end, becuase of their death. it is very weird for me to cry in a manga or anime, but a hentai of two pedophilles holding hands, at their last breath was sad for me. The way the MC remembers his good times of drawnings he and Yamazaki made while looking at the roof where all the girls are (in drawning). Ya'll know a guy got arrested for imitating one of quzilax's work right? It forced him to stop righting rape-scenarios. It was the guy checking the gas-lines post earth-quake; that's the plot the rapist used for "inspiration". The cops came and interviewed quzilax about it, and basically said: "stop giving them ideas, or ELSE" (I wouldn't wanna be fuck with Japanese "justice" system)...
